title: defekt
body:
Ich kriege diese Kaffeemaschine nicht zum Laufen, sie zieht kein Wasser. Ich hatte jetzt insgesamt 2 gebrauchte (Amazon Warehousedeals) und eine neue Kaffeemaschinen hier, keine hat funktioniert, sie ziehen alle kein Wasser, es sei denn, man schraubt den Kopf ein bisschen lose, was lt. Bedienungsanleitung aber nicht vorgesehen ist, vermutlich, weil dann der Druck nicht stimmt und es ausserdem die Maschine verschmutzt. Ich hab jetzt die Faxen dicke, ich habe alle 3 Maschinen geputzt und wieder verpackt und ganz ehrlich, Swan kann mich mal. Die spinnen doch, solche Maschinen zu verkaufen. Ich habe die komplette Bedienungsanleitung gelesen (English only) und habe ich mir sicherheitshalber noch Unboxing-Videos auf Youtube reingezogen, aber nein, ich habe wohl nichts falsch gemacht, bei Swan funktioniert einfach offensichtlich nur jede 4. Maschine. √Ñtzend!!!!
Ihr k√∂nnt Euch das Drama bei Youtube ansehen, bitte "Swan Retro One Touch SK22150BLN Express Halbautomatische Kaffeemaschine, Vintage Design, 1200W" eingeben, da Links hier nicht gepostet werden k√∂nnen.

title: Don't buy this if you like your coffee hot
body:
I love that this machine can make different coffees with one button. I don't like the milk temperature - it's lukewarm at best. I end up heating the milk in a Nespresso frother which means I could have just bought a far less expensive machine.

You don't have to press the button to stop it brewing coffee which is good, but the espresso sizes are small.

The only fix I can find is to put the milk temperature onto the cleaning option then it boils it!

body:
Die erste Maschine war kaputt, es wurde kein Wasser angesaugt. Die zweite funktioniert, aber zwei Teile fehlen (der Tamper und der kleine Siebeinsatz). Die Tassengr√∂sse der gr√∂ssten Tasse Kaffee ist winzig!!! F√ºr einen normalen Kaffee muss man zwei mal den gr√∂ssten Kaffee rauslassen und braucht daher auch √ºberdurchschnittlich viel Kaffee. Der Geschmack ist maximal durchschnittlich. Milchschaum kommt fast gar nichts, falls man tats√§chlich einen Kakao machen wollen w√ºrde, br√§uchte man einen ganzen Tag mit der Funktion extra Milch.
H√ºbsch anzusehen ist die Maschine, aber auch sehr schade, dass sie nur aus Plastik ist. Wir sind sehr traurig und werden den Artikel retournieren.

Con la polvere √® ancora meglio ma personalmente per praticit√† uso pi√π spesso le cialde. Il latte schiumato √® fantastico, si pu√≤ scegliere se poca schiuma, normale o molta. title: Disappointing
body: Bitterly disappointed that almost 2 months in I still haven‚Äôt had a decent coffee from this. Not my first coffee machine and I use a good coffee that is delicious from other coffee makers. The first dozen coffees had a chemical taste (machine was cleaned and primed before use). No limescale issues but chemical taste went away when I used bottled water, this is not a viable option for me going forward. Not enough flavour of the coffee gets through the filter, even on a double dose. I‚Äôll never buy another Swan product. I purchased in April 22 and the machine is no longer in use. I have too many morals to even think about passing it to someone else, I wouldn‚Äôt even give it away

author: Helen limmer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 14 de marzo de 2022

title: You shouldn't buy it
body:
Short: it will cost you a lot buying replacement parts, do not by Swan coffee machines.
Long:
After around 3 months of usage, the coffee filter was clogged to a point that it couldn' t be used. The machine could not push the water through. I tried to use descaler, it didn't help. I thought it was a faulty one, so I ordered a new filter. After 3 months, it was clogged again. I even dismantled it to be able to clean it as thoroughly as possible, it didn't help.
I contacted their support, as it seems this is a low quality product and a filter costs 14 pounds, so buying one in every 3 months doesn't seem a good option.
Well, to show the quality of their support, their first reply was: "this can be due to the coffee being over packed or there being too much coffee in the Filter. The water has no where to filter through." They obviously think their customers have no brain at all.
If you think the support got better after this, don't hope. They basically told me they won't help, but they needed 2 weeks to get to that point. They are slow and still blame COVID.
This was the last Swan product I bought and I am going to buy an other coffee machine. This is the worst I've ever had.

I have to extend my review. It is basically a continuous maintenance project to keep this coffee maker functional. I have to dismantle and assemble the filter so often, I am thinking to buy an other brand. On the top of that, I noticed that water is leaking from the tank. Reason is that if I pour too much water into it, the pressure is too high, so the water leeks... Cleaning the milk container is a pain, too many small parts and holes. This product is definitely overdesigned and nobody who was part of the project actually makes coffee, I think. It looks nice as decoration if it matches you kitchen furtniture, so if you want that, it's for you. Otherwise, find an better one.
author: Robert Nemet
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 8 de marzo de 2022

title: Help!! No milk comes out
body: I love the look and was really excited to try it out. I followed the instructions to the letter. I started off with the priming but no steam came out so went on to try a latte, I have tried unsuccessfully several times to make one but no milk comes out and no steam, I have checked I have done everything correctly but it just won't work!!! I can get an espresso no problem but I don't like espresso!!! I'm beginning to think I should have got the manual one or a better quality. Please someone help before I chuck it out the window!!!

title: NOT 20 bars of pressure

title: Has a mind of its own
body: Got this product and have used it for some time. It has a mind of its own. The amount of froth created by the control knob, it works opposite to what the dial instructions say. Whilst the made coffee is drinkable, I wouldn't give it more than 5 out of 10.

title: It's Junk doesn't Work at All
body: Ordered this product yesterday followed the pre use instructions and went to bed. Woke up this morning and it doesn't work at all I tried to make a latte and it just dispensed all 300ml of milk and won't successfully make anything but an espresso. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
author: Aaron Wedhorn

title: Be careful moving it
body: When pulling it out to top up the water today I managed to jolt the water container off the connector so ended up with all the water on my work surface. This can be solved by sitting it on a tray to slide in and out easily. I also found the scoop is really annoying. It's too big for the single espresso serving and too small for the large espresso serving. However, once that and the tendency of milk to cook onto the metal froth tube is overlooked, for a "real" coffee machine this is relatively simple to set up, use and keep clean. Yes, tassimo pods are easier but so bad for plastic consumption, and I like the flexibility of sizes and milk froth. I also used the milk frother to make the most luxurious hot chocolate. The green colour is elegant too.
author: Clare
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 7 de noviembre de 2021

title: Most cost effective way to get coffee shop quality at home
body:
Great coffee machine for the price. I am no coffee expert but dislike coffee pod machines and wanted to start the journey to having coffee shop quality at home and this provides it all.

Very easy to clean and the ease of use of button pressing makes it foolproof!

title: Best purchase of 2021
body: We bought this, as we were spending too much in the local coffee shop. So far this has been the best purchase of this year. It makes a brilliant Macchiato, and with a little practice the husband is starting the rival the major coffee shops with his Caramel Mac!!! In the month we've had this, we have used it more than any other coffee machine we've owned and invariably don't leave the house without a coffee every morning. It is easy to use and cleaning is quick and simple. The fact it takes ground coffee means we can choose the strength and flavour that we want, not 'whats selected/provided' in the pods. We really do love it, time will tell if the love affair lasts.
author: Karen Fox

title: Retro coffee machine
body:
What I wanted to know was about the pressure? On the box it has 15 bar. But the description it says 20 bar. I bought this on the strength it was 20 bar pressure.
Your customer service has gone down the pan. At one time you were able to speak to a human being, you only speak to a robot now. Even they say they have tried to ring you number but cannot get through... that‚Äôs rubbish. I tried 5 times but still no vail. Because of this I sent it back to Amazon.

title: Works well, milk container is very bad
body:
I haven‚Äôt tried the blending, I mainly got it for making cappuccinos and americanos.

Cappuccinos are the weakness of the machine since the milk frothing doesn‚Äôt come out very well and the milk container is difficult to clean and requires a minimum amount of milk. If it could use all of the milk in the container it wouldn‚Äôt be so bad, but you‚Äôll need to clean the milk container every day and it has annoying hard-to-clean corners. My hand doesn‚Äôt fit in the container to reach the corners. You‚Äôll also throw out and waste milk. I have started making americanos exclusively.

If you‚Äôre getting this for cappuccinos, I would recommend getting the other retro machine with the manual frother, since the metal jug is easier to clean and you can use the amount of milk you want and froth it how you like.

I like that a normal mug fits under the machine and you don‚Äôt need a small coffee cup.
author: Francis Moloney
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 17 de febrero de 2021

title: Great value for money
body: Very pleased with this machine from swan, I bought a coffee machine from Curry‚Äôs costing twice as much and sent it back after one week, it just didn‚Äôt do what I expected from it for the price,this machine does a far nicer coffee for half the price.
